blogPost.excerpt: Travel Safe helps you discover the safest travel destinations during COVID-19. Browse locations by vaccine rates, travel requirements, and local restrictions.
blogPost.body: Travel Safe helps you discover the safest travel destinations during COVID-19. Browse locations by vaccine rates, travel requirements, and local restrictions.
blogPost.title: Travel Safe - Discover the safest places to travel during Covid19
blogPost.author: Jack Dweck

localize.description: Travel Safe帮助您发现COVID-19期间最安全的旅行目的地。按疫苗率、旅行要求和当地限制浏览地点。
localize.tagline: 发现Covid19期间最安全的旅行地点。

localize.description: Travel Safe幫助您發現COVID-19期間最安全的旅行目的地。按疫苗率、旅行要求和當地限制瀏覽地點。
localize.tagline: 發現Covid19期間最安全的旅行地點。

previous.excerpt: OtO is the first outdoor smart home device that:​ ​ - you can set to water EXACTLY where you want​ - applies environmentally-friendly fertilizers & pest control​ - saves you time, water, and money​ Plus, it’s solar powered! 🌞​
previous.title: OtO Lawn - A smart sprinkler that makes sustainable lawncare effortless

localize.description: OtO是第一款户外智能家居设备，它可以： - 你可以设置在你想要的地方浇水 - 施用环保的肥料和害虫控制 - 节省你的时间、水和金钱，而且，它是太阳能供电的。🌞
localize.tagline: 让可持续草坪护理变得轻松的智能洒水车

localize.description: OtO是第一款戶外智能家居設備，它可以： - 你可以設置在你想要的地方澆水 - 施用環保的肥料和害蟲控制 - 節省你的時間、水和金錢，而且，它是太陽能供電的。🌞
localize.tagline: 讓可持續草坪護理變得輕鬆的智能灑水車

next.excerpt: Bluu handles all the repetitive tasks required for proper documentation in your meetings. No more screen sharing, access permission issues, messy documents all over the place or needing to remember to send the minute. Let Bluu take care of that for you 🚀
next.title: Bluu - Google docs built for meetings on Google Meet & Zoom

localize.description: Bluu可以处理所有重复性的任务，以便在你的会议中进行适当的记录。不再有屏幕共享、访问权限问题、到处都是乱七八糟的文件或需要记得发送会议记录。让Bluu为你处理这些问题 🚀。
localize.tagline: 在Google Meet & Zoom上为会议构建的Google docs。

localize.description: Bluu可以處理所有重複性的任務，以便在你的會議中進行適當的記錄。不再有屏幕共享、訪問權限問題、到處都是亂七八糟的文件或需要記得發送會議記錄。讓Bluu爲你處理這些問題 🚀。
localize.tagline: 在Google Meet & Zoom上爲會議構建的Google docs。
